text: Vaadaka Veettile Athidhi (English: Guest in rental house) is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Ramdas. ==Cast== * Hari * Shubha * KPAC Lalitha * Manavalan Joseph * Raghavan * Paul Vengola * Adoor Pankajam * Jayabharathi * M. G. Soman ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by M. K. Arjunan.https://www.malayalachalachithram.com/listsongs.php?m=1226 *Kunkuma Theerthakal - K. J. Yesudas *Ninte Neelamizhikal - P. Jayachandran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Vaadaka Veettile Athidhi
